alert.note: Alert for Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 8:10PM EDT until May 27 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR EASTERN LOUISA COUNTY... At 809 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Mineral to near Bumpass to 7 miles north of Gum Spring, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Bumpass around 815 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Orchid, Wares Crossroads, Locust Creek, Fredericks Hall and Apple Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
